question: Jesus Christ... ...you just murdered Beanie... Hey! Get him out-- muscle him if you have to. Take him down the quietly, use the service exit. Then get back up here and we'll handle the rest of this. What? Is there somebody else in there? Avert your eyes gents, y'didn't see that. Okay Vitoli, listen these last few minutes make you a material witness, do you understand what that means? You do know what that means! Tremendous, that's the attitude. Alright, Vitoli, hang tight for half a tic, we've got a special sort of "clean-up" we gotta do here, alright? What's he doing, is he getting this?
answer: Yeah, he's nodding.

question: Girl, I just saw muzzle flashes comin' out that suite. S'probably where you heard that shootin' earlier, somebody jus' downed Israel. He dead, our play is dead.
answer: I'm not givin' it up jus' yet...

question: C'mon, I say we bounce now, kick it for a lil' bit, play some craps. ...Maybe spend the night?
answer: ...oh...damn...

question: What is it...?
answer: ...Shhhhhhit...girl, there's these two dudes, just sittin' here in this elevator, all shot up...

question: What?
answer: They musta been beefin' big time with one another, cuz this shit, got way past words, whatever it was.

question: ...What are they doin' right now...?
answer: Right now? ...Dying.

question: I want you to locate Agent Carruthers now. The guests that aren't able to leave need to be confined to their suites. And under no circumstances are they to venture out, for any reason. Have the staff make calls to that effect. This him?
answer: Yeah, ye-- I-- uh, there were, earlier, there was that guy Carrut--

question: --Agent Carruthers. Do you know where is he now?
answer: He uh-- he asked about-- I'm-- he wanted to know whic-- what floor security was on, then I saw him get on the elevator with the other agent.

question: Wait a minute, what other agent? What other agent?
answer: He said he was from San Francisco.

question: Did he give you his name?
answer: Yeah, uh-- it was Spanish-somethin' Garcia, or Diego, uh--

question: --run both those names through the D.C. database. Call San Francisco, see if they've got anybody in the field doing collateral inquiries for--
answer: --he was wearing one of our jackets.

question: Who?
answer: The other agent. He said he was here to do an inspection and later, when he got on the elevator with the other guy, Carruthers, I saw him wearing one of our security jackets...

question: This man wearing the jacket identified himself as an Federal agent?
answer: Uh, yeah.

question: You're sure?
answer: Yeah, he had the badge and everything. It said "FBI" on it.

question: And when you saw him later, he was wearing one of your security jackets--
answer: Yeah.

question: And that didn't seem odd to you?
answer: I-- I mean, I thought they gave it to him so he cou--

question: How bad?
answer: Mortal.

question: No.
answer: Yeah.

question: What's your name baby girl...
answer: ...Georgia.

question: Georgia on my mind wit'yo fine ass. You know you saved this black man.
answer: You know I did baby... And a deep, dark one at that. Now if you ain't a dog, which you don't look like--

question: --never in a million girl--
answer: --good, then all you got to be is grateful.

question: No doubt. That's my moms there, taught me them skills.
answer: You love her?

question: My mamma? C'mon shorty, y'gotta ask? You hurtin' pretty bad?
answer: Got hit twice.

question: It's going around ain't it? Mafuckas catching bullets like the common cold up in this bitch. I think I accidentally shot and killed my boy today.
answer: Well, if it's any comfort, I's goin' in to there to act a fool baby. Straight rockin' heat and slayin' niggas--

question: For real?
answer: Mmm-hmm...and your boy very well mighta been one of 'em.

question: True?
answer: Like a mafucka.

question: That takes some of the sting out.
answer: I probably woulda busted on you too ...and what a shame that woulda been.

question: I feel like I know you girl. I feel like I've known you forever. You gonna lemme see your scars?
answer: You do the right thing. Sit with me while I heal, let it develop slow.

question: What were you doin' here anyway?
answer: 'Spose to kill this fool named Buddy Israel. Damn baby girl, you makin' a nigga fall hard now.

question: ...Deputy Director Locke?
answer: Here. Sit. Please.

question: This is him? The hitman hired to kill Israel? He's a doctor?
answer: Difficult to explain everything now... And much larger issues loom. I'm sorry about Carruthers...Damndest thing to have to die for. Very well. Take Mr. Israel to the roof, he'll be traveling with us.

question: What the hell-- What is this!? People died. Agent Carruthers is dead!
answer: We have to transport Mr. Israel to Las Vegas, time is of the essence. The gulfstream is standing by on the jetway at Tahoe International. I'm sorry, I'm restricted from disclosing anymore information. Return to Washington. You'll be debriefed in the coming days.

question: That your car?
answer: No, I'm confiscating it.

question: You're F.B.I.?
answer: That's right...and I'd advise y'ta lower your weapon sir.

question: You investigating those murders out at the lake?
answer: Ww...uh...

question: Three men were ambushed and shot, two died and had their bodies tossed into the lake, the other has severe hypothermia, possible dementia and will probably be a multiple amputee by week's end...if he even lives that long.
answer: No, I ain't even heard abou--

question: You "ain't"-- You have any idea how close to death I've been? You understand that I'm dying now? That I've survived bullets and frostbite and raging fever-- missing fingers and every fucking imaginable horror in between? And I'm asking you now, "Is that your car" and you can't even come clean and do me the decency of a straight answer, with the fucking state that I'm in!?
answer: Yeah, shit-- hell, you're right. I'm sorry.

question: You shot me and murdered my friends.
answer: I did. We-- yeah, I know.

question: And threw us into the lake.
answer: Pretty much, yep.

question: And this is your car, isn't it?
answer: Mmm-hmm.

question: But there were more of you?
answer: Yeah, m'brothers...They didn't make it.

question: Two of 'em?
answer: Thass' right. I got other brother's though, so it ain't so bad.

question: You were here huntin' a man named Israel, weren't you? Your name is Tremor.
answer: I was. It is...That who you was here for? Israel? Well...we both got beat out then, didn't we?

question: Yes we did... Now, give me your car keys. And get the fuck out of here.
answer: S'fair...lemme just grab somethin'. No, no, no, I'm done with all that. Probably needs to be tuned. Air filter's old. Plugs might be bad. Heater and AC ain't worked in forever. There's some good drugs in the glove box there, homespun, keep you smiling, semi-lucid at leas'... Well, God's speed t'ya then. Sorry 'bout all that. S'way a'the world though, winners and losers y'know. S'way it's always goin' be...

question: ...Oh, fuck that...
answer: Your friends were taken to Carson City Memorial, they're going to be autopsied and shipped back for burial.

question: I'll take care of it.
answer: Who owned this car?

question: The ones that killed 'em.
answer: Where are they now?

question: I just want to go home man...I just want to go home and forget this fucking place even exists.
answer: Where's that? Home.

question: Las Vegas.
answer: You're injured...Let me drive.

question: You're injured...Let me drive.
answer: ...for a press release. Officially, he took his own life, suicide by hanging, something of that sort. Basic bullet points-- despondent over the turn his career had taken, troubles with the law, history of substance abuse and so on--

question: Where's Israel?
answer: What are you doing here?

question: My debrief--
answer: --will be handled back in--

question: --no, we need to handle it now.
answer: You were given instructions to get on that plane and return to Washington--

question: You're going to tell me why no call was made to inform us that the Israel situation had been "altered." Why I-- and my friend and partner, whose body is going into a furnace tomorrow, were not sufficiently apprised of Bureau movement on this matter.
answer: I can't discuss--

question: --You can and you will.
answer: You're finished.

question: And you just figured that out? The Swede isn't a hitman, is he? He's a surgeon. Sparazza didn't want Israel's heart for a trophy, he wanted it for a transplant...why?
answer: ...They're father and son...

question: ...A paternity suit, filed 1967...
answer: --Brought against Sparazza by Israel's mother Laverne who was nineteen at the time. They had a brief affair which Israel was the by-product of.

question: ...Does he know?
answer: ...He does now...

question: Dr. Sven Ingstrom is head of cardiology at Stockholm University and the foremost heart specialist in all of Europe-- Sparazza was in failing health and looking for a donor. The son who had betrayed and burned him so thoroughly seemed a obvious choice.
answer: So all of our intel was bogus to begin with.

question: Yes. The actual contract went to Lazlo Soot, the man that plunged to his death from the Penthouse yesterday. He was to neutralize Israel's entourage and prep for the removal of his heart. Ingstrom was to handle the surgery itself on-site with the assistance of Dr. Gregory Gill, Israel's personal physician, who was also on the Sparazza payroll.
answer: ...When did you know all this?

question: Information was arriving all day yesterday. When we finally figured out who Sparazza actually was, we--
answer: --What? What do you mean "Who Sparazza actually was..."

question: ...Are you insane?
answer: ...Almost. What do you mean "who Sparazza actually was..." You realize that Sparraza has had thirty-six major medical procedures performed on him since 1953? Elective plastic surgery, every single one--

question: It wasn't elective. It was undertaken to save his life. And it wasn't cosmetic, it was reconstructive...Look at the date of the first procedure.
answer: ...Yeah, fifty-three.

question: The same year that Sparazza murdered Agent Freeman Heller...
answer: ...holy shit...that's Heller... Isn't it?
